message.raw:
Restore padding to globals when they have multiple lines, rather than just
being their minimum height. Set margin of editor to stop the text from jumping
when entering/exiting editing. (this does not fix the name jumping to the top
when there is a multi-line value. It prevents single-line names/values and
multiline values from jumping.
